main event: A high school student observed one oval-shaped object at Floyd Bennett Navy AB for over an hour.
interesting points: The object was white and sized like a quarter when viewed through binoculars., The object changed course from N to SW and then faded out., The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 20 minutes., Observations were made under clear weather conditions., Wind data supported the object's movement direction.
location: Floyd Bennett Navy AB, New York, USA
